name: Switch (itch)
description:
Switch is a very simple game where you have to synchronize yourself in order to tap switches in time.

If you miss one circle, you loose.
If you tap on a red switch, you loose.

This game is hard.
This game is harsh.
This game hurts.
But this game loves you... in a way.

Challenge yourself and try improving your reflexes.

More than 1.1 Million of harsh and pitiless games have been already played on smartphone. Be sure that you won't be crying alone.

WARNING: This game has been designed to be played on a tactile device. It's difficult as hell to play it with a mouse.

This game is fully playable by people suffering from colorblindness.
